#labels Phase-Deploy,Download,package,tar.gz
HowTo: Add Download Package (tar.gz)

1. Commit changes to sockperf on google code: 'svn ci'
2. Check out clean sockperf: 'svn co https://sockperf.googlecode.com/svn/branches/sockperf_v2 sockperf'
3. Shrink to .tar.gz: 'tar -pczf sockperf_2.5.REV_NEW.tar.gz sockperf'
4. Upload as new Download package to google docs with some details about the major changes 
5. Add the major changes to the wiki page
